html:
{% macro render_invoice(copy_type) %}
{{ letter_head }}
Tax Invoice
Buyer Details
{{ doc.address_display }}
GSTIN No : {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address", doc.customer_address, "gstin") or 'N/A' }}
Invoice No. :
Invoice Date :
{{doc.name}}
{{doc.posting_date|global_date_format}}
Carrier :
Mode of Transport :
Tpt. L.R. No. & Date :
Road Permit No :
No. of Cases :
Weight of Consignment :
{{ doc.spn_carrier or ' ' }}
{{ doc.spn_mode_of_transport or ' '}}
{% if doc.spn_lr_no %} {{ doc.spn_lr_no + ', ' + doc.spn_lr_date|global_date_format }} {% else %} {{ ' ' }} {% endif %}
{{ doc.spn_road_permit_no or ' ' }}
{{ doc.spn_no_of_cases or ' ' }}
{% if doc.spn_consignment_weight %} {{ doc.spn_consignment_weight }} (kg) {% else %} {{ ' ' }} {% endif %}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- for tax in doc.taxes -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Code Item Description Basic Price Qty Unit Value
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_code }}
HSN Code : {{frappe.db.get_value("Item",row.item_code,"gst_hsn_code")}}		 {{ row.description }} {{row.rate}} {{row.qty}} {{row.amount}}
Gross Total {{ doc.total }}
{{tax.description}} {{ '%0.2f' % tax.tax_amount }}
Grand Total {{doc.grand_total}}
{{ doc.terms }}
The Goods are dispatched subject to your acceptance. Please acknowledge receipt of the goods
For Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited
Receiver's Signature Stamp
Regd Office: Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited, Eucharistic Congress Bldg. No. 2, 3rd Floor, 5 Convent Street, Colaba, Mumbai 400001.
{% endmacro %} {{ render_invoice("Original - Buyer's Copy") }} {{ render_invoice("Duplicate - Transporter's Copy") }} {{ render_invoice("Triplicate - Seller's Copy") }}
name: SPN GST Sales Invoice

html:
{% macro render_invoice(copy_type) %}
{{ letter_head }}
Stock Transfer Note / Retail Invoice
{% if doc.purpose != "Material Transfer" %}
{% endif %} {% if doc.spn_to_warehouse %}
TO
{{wh.address_line_1 }}
{{ wh.address_line_2 }}
{{ wh.city}}
{{ wh.state }}
Mob.: {{ wh.mobile_no }}
Tel.: {{ wh.phone_no }}
{% endif %}
Invoice No. :
Invoice Date :
{{doc.name}}
{{doc.posting_date|global_date_format}}
Carrier :
Mode of Transport :
Tpt. L.R. No. & Date :
Road Permit No :
No. of Cases :
Gross Weight:
{{ doc.st_carrier or '
' }}
{{ doc.st_mode_of_transport or ' '}}
{% if doc.st_lr_no %} {{ doc.st_lr_no + ', ' + doc.st_lr_date|global_date_format }} {% else %} {{ ' ' }} {% endif %}
{{ doc.st_road_permit_no or ' ' }}
{{ doc.st_no_of_cases or ' ' }}
{% if doc.st_gross_weight %} {{ doc.st_gross_weight }} (kg) {% else %} {{ ' ' }} {% endif %}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Code Description Basic Price STN Price Qty UOM Value
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_code }} {{ row.description }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Item Price", filters={"item_code": row.item_code, "price_list": "Standard Selling"}, fieldname="price_list_rate") }} {{row.basic_rate}} {{row.qty}} {{row.uom}} {{row.basic_amount}}
The Goods are dispatched subject to your acceptance. Please acknowledge receipt of the goods
For Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited
Receiver's Signature Stamp
Regd Office: Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited, Eucharistic Congress Bldg. No. 2, 3rd Floor, 5 Convent Street, Colaba, Mumbai 400001.
{% endmacro %} {{ render_invoice("Original") }} {{ render_invoice("Duplicate") }} {{ render_invoice("Triplicate") }}
